data.title: Staff Directory – Office of the Provost
data.text:
Lisa J. Anderson leads the Office of Online Learning (OOL) and oversees inclusive and equity-minded strategic partnerships and initiatives that promote student success, excellence, and innovation in digital education. In her role, she collaborates with stakeholders across and beyond campus to enhance accessible online and hybrid education pathways, build capacity for mission-driven digital education, incubate and strengthen digital programs and initiatives, and direct institutional policy-making with respect to digital strategy. Anderson also serves as a Clinical Assistant Professor in the Technology Entrepreneur Center, focusing on leadership, innovation, and educational transformation. Her work and writing have been featured in national publications including Inside Higher Education, Government Technology, and EdSurge, as well as podcasts such as EdTech Insiders.

See Bio

Jane Baumgartner

Assistant to Associate Chancellor and Vice Provost for Budget and Resource Planning, and Executive Associate Provost for Budget and Resource Planning

jmbaumga@illinois.edu

(217) 300-2702

Jane Baumgartner assists the Associate Chancellor and Vice Provost for Budget and Resource Planning, and Executive Associate Provost for Budget and Resource Planning. Her responsibilities include calendar management and processing of information received via correspondence, reports, email, and telephone. She serves as a liaison for the Associate Chancellor and Vice Provost for Budget and Resource Planning with academic and administrative units across campus. She also provides support for the Administrative Budget Committee, Budget Officers Council, and Campus Budget Reform Committee.

See Bio

Theresa Beckett

Assistant to the Provost

tbeckett@illinois.edu

(217) 244-4115

Theresa Beckett directs the daily operations of the Office of the Provost, manages the support team, provides overall coordination of the Provost’s activities, and supports the Council of Deans. She also serves as the liaison to the Provost’s direct reports, units across campus, and external constituents.

See Bio

William Bernhard

Executive Vice Provost for Academic Affairs and Interim Associate Chancellor and Vice Provost for Budget and Resource Planning

bernhard@illinois.edu

(217) 333-6677

Assistant: Jean Hanks

jhanks@illinois.edu

(217) 300-5398

As Executive Vice Provost for Academic Affairs, William Bernhard provides leadership in the areas of academic and faculty affairs. His portfolio includes faculty development, the Provost Fellows program, human resources, academic awards, and assessment. Dr. Bernhard is also Interim Associate Chancellor and Vice Provost for Budget and Resource Planning, providing strategic budget planning and allocation advice to the Chancellor and Provost, guidance to the university in areas related to budget, finance, planning and resource allocation, leadership and management of the campus budget office.

See Bio

Abrielle Bujack

Designer

abujack2@illinois.edu

As a designer, Abrielle Bujack assists the Office of the Provost with the creative process, designing deliverables used in the promotion of events, initiatives and more while ensuring the proper implementation of the Illinois brand standards.

See Bio

Brian Bundren

Assistant Provost for Capital Planning

bundren@illinois.edu

(217) 244-6445

Assistant: Lesa Wilcoxon

lesaw@illinois.edu

(217) 300-4644

As the Assistant Provost for Capital Planning, Brian Bundren is responsible for ensuring the effective use of campus facilities, including over 13 million square feet assigned in support of academic activities. He plays a major role in all efforts to maintain and improve the physical infrastructure of campus in collaboration with academic and administrative units, reporting to the Associate Chancellor/Vice Provost for Budget and Resource Planning.

See Bio

José Cañas

Special Projects and Events Associate

canas@illinois.edu

(217) 300-4549

José Cañas serves as the primary support for the special projects and events team in the Office of the Provost. His responsibilities include calendar and project management, maintaining a comprehensive list of events coordinated by the Office of the Provost, and obtaining and managing information from university offices and outside vendors. Mr. Cañas serves as the liaison for the special projects and events team with units across campus and external constituents.

See Bio

Jennifer Carleton

Assistant to the Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs and Provost and the Assistant to the Provost

carleton@illinois.edu

(217) 300-0287

Jennifer Carleton is the principal assistant to the Provost and Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs and the Assistant to the Provost. Her duties include assisting in day-to-day operations, organizing the Provost’s time and commitments, and initiating statute-mandated processes. She also serves as a liaison to the Provost’s direct reports, units across campus, and external constituents.

See Bio

Melissa Chan

Major Awards Coordinator

melissao@illinois.edu

(217) 300-1585

Melissa Chan is a Major Awards Coordinator who facilitates the identification of major scholarly awards and recognitions to ensure successful faculty are appropriately recognized. She works in conjunction with the colleges on campus to nominate University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign faculty for these designations.

See Bio
